articles.author: PerthNow
articles.title: Donald Trump’s trial to begin in March 2024
articles.description: Donald Trump’s trial for plotting to overturn the 2020 US election result has been set for 4 March 2024, almost eight months to the day ahead of the next presidential poll.
articles.content:
Donald Trump’s trial date has been set for 4 March 2024.
The timing means that Trump’s trial on charges of plotting to overturn the result of the 2020 presidential election could start nearly eight months to the day before the 2024 presidential vote.... [1203 chars]
